channel.title: Pages on LiaScript
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on LiaScript

item.title: Atom - Editor
item.description: Although, the Atom editor is not actively maintained anymore, it is still a great editor for writing Markdown documents.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Get in touch with us via … Gitter: https://app.gitter.im/#/room/#LiaScript_community:gitter.im Twitter: https://twitter.

item.title: Development - Server
item.description: If you want to use another of your preferred editors, you can also install the development server.

item.title: Elements
item.description: Table of Contents Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Emphasis Button Link Paragraph Ordered List Unordered List Notice Tab Accordions Code and Syntax Highlighting Blockquote Tables Image Gallery Slider Youtube video Custom video Here is an example of headings.

item.title: Exporter
item.description: This shall be a generic LiaScript-Exporter that can export educational content into different formats, so that LiaScript courses can also be utilized in different Learning Management Systems (LMS) or Readers for static content (PDF, ePub, …).

item.title: Live - Editor
item.description: The LiveEditor is an entirely browser-based collaborative Editor. It covers nearly all functionalities of other server-based solutions, but in this case, you don’t need a server nor a login.

item.title: Privacy
item.description: Responsibility of Contributors Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.

item.title: VSCode - Editor
item.description: Installation To install VSCode with LiaScript follow the steps from the following Blog-post.

item.title: VSCode-Web - Editor
item.description: This is a preview module for LiaScript courses developed for the VSCode-Web editor, thus no installation everything is browser-based.
